tests.prompt: Verify refs.Abilities.Strength() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'abilities', ID: 'str'}. Test all 6 abilities.
Verify refs.Weapons.Longsword() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'weapons', ID: 'longsword'}. Test all weapons from weapons/common.go.
Verify refs.Armor.Plate() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'armor', ID: 'plate'}. Test all armor from armor/armor.go.
Verify refs.DamageTypes.Slashing() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'damage_types', ID: 'slashing'}. Test all damage types.
Verify refs.Races.Human() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'races', ID: 'human'}. Test all races from races/races.go.
Verify refs.Skills.Acrobatics() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'skills', ID: 'acrobatics'}. Test all 17 skills.
Verify refs.Backgrounds.Acolyte() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'backgrounds', ID: 'acolyte'}. Test all backgrounds.
Verify refs.Languages.Common() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'languages', ID: 'common'}. Test all languages.
Verify refs.FightingStyles.Dueling() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'fighting_styles', ID: 'dueling'}. Test all 6 styles.
Verify refs.Tools.ThievesTools() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'tools', ID: 'thieves-tools'}. Test all tools.
Verify refs.Spells.Fireball() returns *core.Ref{Module: 'dnd5e', Type: 'spells', ID: 'fireball'}. Test representative spells.
Run go test ./rulebooks/dnd5e/refs/... -v and verify all tests pass.
Run make pre-commit and verify it passes (fmt, lint, tests).
